about_the_game:
Re:Agent - Demo Disclaimer


Disclaimer: This Re:Agent demo is currently in development. Some features, including the resurrection mechanic, are not fully implemented, and the artwork is not final. Our goal with this demo is to gather feedback from players to improve and refine the game.

This demo is a proof of concept, it may have bugs, but it is what we have been able to achieve with hard work and very little budget.

Re:Agent offers an exciting gaming experience that combines elements of stealth, action, puzzle-solving, and exploration. In this demo, players can immerse themselves in the intriguing world of Agent 314, an artificial agent navigating through a dangerous and mysterious environment.

Demo Features

Combat and Movement System:


Versatile and Dynamic: Experience intense combat with a variety of weapons and fluid movements.

Stealth and Caution: Utilize the environment to hide from enemies and avoid unnecessary confrontations.

Agile Movement: Navigate quickly through the world using stealth tactics to remain unseen by enemies.

Upcoming Features


Strategy and Resilience: In future updates, the demo will include a resurrection mechanic where Agent 314 is reborn as a new clone each time he dies, utilizing the bodies of previous clones to overcome challenges.

Adaptability: Customize and upgrade your weapons to suit your playstyle.

[]Creative Challenges: Solve puzzles using clever interactions with objects and the environment.

[]Detailed Exploration: Investigate each area thoroughly to discover secrets and alternate routes.

Story


In a world fractured by decades of conflicts and ideological differences, Re:Agent plunges players into a covert conflict between two opposing nations: the Democratic Republic of Abilytia and the Confederate States of Ophidia. As Agent 314, an artificial being created by Abilytia, you must infiltrate Ophidia to obtain crucial information about its secret activities and technologies. What begins as a routine espionage mission quickly becomes a perilous journey through the dark and complex intrigues of both nations.

We invite you to try the Re:Agent demo and immerse yourself in this captivating gaming experience. Explore, solve puzzles, engage in combat, and use stealth to advance your mission. Stay tuned for future updates that will include the innovative resurrection mechanic, adding even more depth and strategy to the game.

We look forward to your feedback and are excited to have you join this adventure from its earliest stages!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence and sensitive psychological topics.

name: Re:Agent

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2400G / Intel Core i5-9400F
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 590 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance: 1080p/60fps with graphics settings at "Low". Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. - 64-bit processor and operating system are required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2400G / Intel Core i5-9400F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660 Ti / Intel Arc A750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance: 1080p/60fps with graphics settings at "High". Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. - 64-bit processor and operating system are required. - Windows 10 (Version 1809 or later) and a 4GB VRAM GPU (graphics board or video card) are required for DirectX 12 API.

short_description: Take on the role of Agent 314, a spy with a secret mission in the rival nation of Ophidia. Explore a dystopian society, confront ethical dilemmas, and tackle tactical challenges. Can you uncover the hidden truth behind the facade and complete your mission before it's too late?
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain
